material.mattext: In terms of copyright, Fair Use is determined to be
The use of a copyrighted work for purposes such as criticism, reporting, teaching, scholarship, or research.
The use of anything you find on the Web
Copying other’s music and fairly distributing it to your friends
None of the answers are correct
_______ is a JavaScript library intended to simplify client-side scripting:
none of the answers are correct
none of the answers are correct

Scenario: The Internet Explorer 8 browser is being used to display a web page with an audio player but the audio element displays nothing on the page. Read the following code snippet and select the reason for the incorrect display from the choices below.
<audio controls="controls">
       <source src="podcast.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
                  <source src="podcast.ogg" type="audio/ogg">
</audio>
The controls attribute should be controls=”yes”
There are too many source elements.
There is no fallback content to display for browsers that do not support the audio element.
The MIME type values are incorrect.
Select a disadvantage of displaying Flash media in a web page from the list below:
You need to create multiple video files in different formats.
No browser plug-in or player is needed.
Flash is supported in all browsers.
Flash is not supported on many mobile devices.
Select an advantage of displaying HTML5 video in a web page from the list below:
You need to create multiple video files in different formats.
No browser plug-in or player is needed.
All browsers play all video formats.
All of the answers are advantages.
Select a transition-timing-function value which configures a transition effect that begins at a constant speed and slows down at the end.
use video and sound whenever possible
supply text descriptions of audio and video files that appear in your web pages
never use audio and video files
none of the answers are correct
Select the term below which is a protocol that provides a method for software components to communicate, interact, and share data.
Select the term below which names an HTML5 API that allows web page visitors to share their geographic location.
Select the term below which names an HTML5 API that is used in progressive web applications:
The CSS3 _______ property allows you to rotate, scale, skew, or move an element.
The CSS3 _______ property provides for changes in property values to display in a smoother manner over a specified time.
A database is a collection of information organized so that its contents can easily be accessed, managed, and updated.
A domain name is assigned to you when you submit your website to a search engine.
A _______ involves the exclusive use of a rented computer and connection to the Internet that is housed in the web hosting company's premises.
A _______ is a word, phrase, symbol, or design that identifies and distinguishes the source of the goods of one party from those of others.
A rating determined by a search engine based on the number of links to a particular site and the qualities of those links is called _______.
none of the answers are correct
A search engine will only index a web page if the HTML and CSS are pass W3C validation testing.
Before selecting a web host provider, it is a good idea to.
Try to contact their technical support
Make sure they are the cheapest possible
Carefully read their service level agreement
both “Try to contact their technical support” and “Carefully read their service level agreement”
Commercial businesses should register a domain name with a .org TLD.
FTP is a _______ that is utilized to copy and manage files over the Internet.
How would you configure a hyperlink from the index.html file to another file named services.html which is located in the same folder?
How would you configure a hyperlink from the index.html file to another file named services.html which is located in a subfolder named categories?
